name: DAO Out
description: DAO Out tributes to the future of decentralisation; massive organisations that are truly distributed and automated. The DAO Out jumpsuit features a surplice neckline, long sleeves and a wrap closure with satin ties. The futuristic silver silk base material is spotted with a signature pattern representation of a DAO; revealing the interconnectedness of the Smart Contracts and the distribution of its participants. The outfit offers a flattering fit-and-flare silhouette, a mix of comfort and professionalism - perfect for any day or night on the voting forums.
